title: ML Image Classifier
description: Advanced deep learning model for multi-class image classification using TensorFlow and Convolutional Neural Networks. Achieved 94% accuracy on test dataset with data augmentation and transfer learning techniques.

title: Data Analytics Dashboard
description: Interactive web dashboard for comprehensive data visualization and analytics. Features real-time data processing, multiple chart types, and export functionality built with Python and Streamlit.

title: Computer Vision Object Detection
description: Real-time object detection and tracking system using YOLO algorithm and OpenCV. Capable of detecting multiple objects simultaneously with bounding box annotations and confidence scores.

title: Sentiment Analysis Tool
description: Natural Language Processing tool for sentiment analysis of social media posts and reviews. Uses BERT transformer model for high accuracy emotion detection and classification.

title: Predictive Maintenance System
description: IoT-based predictive maintenance solution using machine learning algorithms to predict equipment failures. Incorporates sensor data analysis and maintenance scheduling automation.

title: AI Chatbot Assistant
description: Intelligent conversational AI chatbot powered by GPT and custom training data. Features context awareness, multi-language support, and integration with various messaging platforms.
